name: Ungrounded (Villieon)
description:
WASD to move. P to power switches.

Platformer submitted for the 48 + 8 Jam #3

The theme was "Ungrounded".

You play as a "Grounded" electrical circuit diagram symbol who finds they can become ungrounded. To get to the next room, you will need to complete the ungrounded electrical circuits to get the door to open.

Managed to pull this together in about 10 hours. Wish I had more time for sounds and particle effects so I may add them after the jam.
